request_pathways.name: Authorization to Release and/or Obtain Health Records (English)
Autorización para solicitar / enviar historial médico (Spanish)

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patient downloads a general-purpose ROI authorization PDF, prints and completes it by hand, and emails the completed form to registration@rvh.org.

red_flags: No fillable fields in born-digital 2025 PDF forces print-handwrite-scan workflow
bright_spots: Bilingual form suite (English and Spanish) with color-coded instructional companion guides
Email submission available (registration@rvh.org) — no in-person visit required
Recently updated forms (December 2025) indicating active maintenance
Instructional guides translate bureaucratic section headers into plain-language explanations

findability.rationale: Level 4: Forms were easy to find with basic web search and standard site navigation (Patients & Visitors → Medical Records); prominently linked with clear labels and descriptive filenames.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 3: Born-digital PDF with text layer but zero fillable fields requires print-handwrite-scan workflow; email submission is available as an electronic pathway, making the form usable digitally with workarounds.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized single-page form with clear section headers and logical flow; minor issues with dense legal text in the certification block, offset by the availability of color-coded instructional companion guides.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 3: The form is a generic ROI authorization designed for inter-facility record routing; a patient can use it for self-access by selecting 'Personal Use' but the form wasn't designed for this use case and requires navigating irrelevant facility sections.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: No notarization, witness, or in-person requirements; 12-month expiration and revocation rights are clearly stated; minor ambiguities include no fee disclosure, no response time commitment, and no explicit HIPAA Right of Access reference.

overall.summary: Cherokee Health Systems provides an easy-to-find, well-organized form suite with standout bilingual instructional guides, but the generic ROI authorization design and lack of fillable fields prevent it from reaching the top tier for patient self-access.
